legalInfoItems.address: Registered office address: 20 rue du 11 novembre, Résidence de Gandaillat, 63370 Lempdes

terms.title: 2. Terms of use
terms.text: Using https://chaindev.fr implies full acceptance of these terms of use. These terms may be modified at any time without notice. Users are invited to consult them regularly.
terms.accessText1: The site is freely accessible to any user with an Internet connection. All costs related to access (hardware, connection, etc.) are the responsibility of the user.
terms.accessText2: Access to the site may be interrupted by the publisher for maintenance or force majeure without prior notice.
terms.contentText: All site elements (trademarks, texts, images, sounds, videos, etc.) are protected by intellectual property laws. Any reproduction or use without written permission is strictly prohibited.
managementItems: Suspension, interruption or limitation of access to all or part of the site.
terms.managementItem2: Removal of any information that could disrupt operation.
terms.managementItem3: Temporary suspension of the site for updates.
terms.liabilityText1: The publisher cannot be held responsible in case of technical failure preventing access to the site or its features.
terms.liabilityText2: The user is solely responsible for protecting their equipment and data while browsing.
terms.linksText: The site may contain links to other websites. The publisher assumes no responsibility for the content of these third-party sites.

services.title: 3. Services provided
services.text: The site https://chaindev.fr offers web development, website creation, maintenance and hosting services. This information is non-contractual unless explicitly stated otherwise.

law.title: 4. Applicable law and competent jurisdiction
law.text: Any dispute related to the use of the site is subject to French law. The courts of Clermont-Ferrand shall have exclusive jurisdiction.

contact.title: 5. Contact
contact.text: For any question regarding this legal notice, contact us by email: chaindev13@proton.me

privacyPolicy.introduction: Chaindev is committed to protecting the privacy of visitors and users of its website https://chaindev.fr. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, share and protect your personal information. By using our site, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

dataCollection.title: 2. COLLECTION OF PERSONAL DATA
dataCollection.directText: We collect personal data you voluntarily provide, notably when you fill in our contact form or email us.
dataCollection.automaticText: When you browse our site, we may automatically collect certain technical information, including:
dataCollection.automaticItem5: Date and time of your visit
dataCollection.cookiesText: Our site uses cookies and other similar technologies to improve your browsing experience and analyze site usage.
dataCollection.cookiesItem2: Essential cookies: necessary for site operation
dataCollection.cookiesItem3: Analytics/performance cookies: we use Google Analytics to understand how visitors interact with the site
dataCollection.cookiesManagement: You can manage your cookie preferences via your browser settings.

usage.title: 3. USE OF PERSONAL DATA
usage.item2: Improve, personalize and develop our site
usage.item3: Understand and analyze how you use our site
usage.item4: Detect, prevent and resolve technical issues

sharing.title: 4. SHARING OF PERSONAL DATA
sharing.serviceProvidersText: We may share your data with third-party providers to operate the site. These providers have access only to the data necessary to perform those tasks.
sharing.legalObligationsText: We may disclose your information if required by law or in response to valid legal requests.
sharing.protectionText: We may disclose your information in case of suspected illegal activity, fraud, or to protect anyone's safety.

retention.title: 5. DATA RETENTION
retention.text: Data is retained only as long as necessary for the purposes stated, unless law requires otherwise.

security.title: 6. DATA SECURITY
security.text: We implement technical and organizational security measures, but no method is entirely secure.

rights.title: 7. YOUR RIGHTS
rights.item1: Right of access, rectification, erasure, restriction, portability
rights.item3: Right to withdraw consent at any time
rights.contactText: Contact us at chaindev13@proton.me to exercise your rights.

transfers.title: 8. INTERNATIONAL DATA TRANSFERS
transfers.text: Your data may be transferred outside the EU, notably via Google Analytics, with safeguards compliant with the GDPR.

externalLinks.title: 9. LINKS TO OTHER SITES
externalLinks.text: We disclaim responsibility for the policies of third-party sites accessed via external links.

changes.title: 10. CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY
changes.text: We may modify this policy. Please review it regularly.

contact.title: 11. CONTACT US
contact.address: Chaindev, 20 rue du 11 novembre, Résidence de Gandaillat, 63370 Lempdes, Email: chaindev13@proton.me
